channel.title: Comments on: My debut poetry collection, HANNIBAL, out now

item.title: By: Shauna Hannibal
item.dc:creator: Shauna Hannibal
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2017/11/27/my-debut-poetry-collection-hannibal-out-now/#comment-762">Alan Daniel</a>.
thanks so much, Alan! I'll of course sign it and do my best to answer questions! :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alan Daniel.

thanks so much, Alan! I’ll of course sign it and do my best to answer questions! ðŸ™‚

thanks so much, Charlie!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Charles Macquarie.

thanks so much, Charlie!

item.title: By: Alan Daniel
item.dc:creator: Alan Daniel
item.description: Looking forward to having my copy signed by you. I have been able to read through the collection twice, and I have some questions.
item.content:encoded: Looking forward to having my copy signed by you. I have been able to read through the collection twice, and I have some questions.

item.title: By: Charles Macquarie
item.dc:creator: Charles Macquarie
item.description: Wow cool congrats Shauna! Look forward to checking it out.
item.content:encoded: Wow cool congrats Shauna! Look forward to checking it out.

item.title: By: Shauna Hannibal
item.dc:creator: Shauna Hannibal
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2017/11/27/my-debut-poetry-collection-hannibal-out-now/#comment-759">Susan Boone</a>.
thanks so much, Susan! and thanks again for ordering the book for Popular Reading!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Susan Boone.

thanks so much, Susan! and thanks again for ordering the book for Popular Reading!

item.title: By: Susan Boone
item.dc:creator: Susan Boone
item.description: Yay, Shauna! Can't wait to read your work!
item.content:encoded: Yay, Shauna! Can’t wait to read your work!

thanks so much, Jim!

item.title: By: Jim Munson
item.dc:creator: Jim Munson
item.description: That is just so exciting! Couldn't be happier for you.
item.content:encoded: That is just so exciting! Couldn’t be happier for you.

item.title: By: Tab McDaniel
item.dc:creator: Tab McDaniel
item.description: Wow Shauna! A published author! This is amazing and so inspiring. Congratulations!
item.content:encoded: Wow Shauna! A published author! This is amazing and so inspiring. Congratulations!
